Title: June 2010
Content: 9*n36226a0916*turn over (b) you are provided with sheets of lead and apparatus to support them safely between the source and the detector.  the thickness of lead affects the count rate.  describe the measurements you would make to investigate this.   your description should include:   a variable you will control to make it a fair investigation   how you will make your results as accurate as possible   one safety precaution.(6)
